document_data.name: Sarsantyr's Tapestries & Draperies
document_data.owner: [[Embre Sarsantyr|Embre]] & [[Raustril Sarsantyr]]{{Cite web/Realmslore/Dawntree, Part Three: Unfolding Lives, Unfolding Dreams}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarsantyr's Tapestries & Draperies''' was a type of textiles shop in the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: This store was located along [[Vondil Street]], in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of Waterdeep.
document_data.Structure: This building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Inhabitants: Sarsantyr's was operated by the couple [[Embre Sarsantyr]] and [[Raustril Sarsantyr]].
